    • Constructor Detail

      • Button

        public Button(double xVal,
              double yVal,
              double w,
              double h,
              java.awt.Color dC,
              java.awt.Color hC,
              java.lang.String t,
              int r)
        Parameters:
        xVal - x coordinate location of the button's center
        yVal - y coordinate location of the button's center
        w - width of the button
        h - height of the button
        dC - Color of button when button it is not being hovered over
        hC - Color of button when button it is being hovered over
        t - the text to be displayed on this Button
        r - the roundness of the button
